Gnoll Brute

The Gnoll Brute is a stronger variant of the standard Gnoll that appears later in the dungeon.

Properties

  • Type: Enemy
  • Level: Mid-dungeon
  • HP: Higher than regular Gnolls
  • Attack: Stronger than regular Gnolls
  • Defense: Better than regular Gnolls
  • Special: When healed by a Gnoll player with the town Healer, this unlocks the Guardian subclass

Behavior

  • More aggressive than regular Gnolls
  • Higher damage output and health
  • Generally found deeper in the dungeon than regular Gnolls

Special Interaction

  • Gnoll Subclass Unlock: The Gnoll Brute plays a crucial role in unlocking the Guardian subclass for the Gnoll hero class
  • When a Gnoll player finds a Gnoll Brute, defeats it (without killing it completely), and brings it to the Healer NPC in town to be healed, this triggers the Gnoll Unlocked badge
  • This mechanic allows Gnoll players to unlock the Guardian subclass, which is otherwise not available through the traditional Tome of Mastery

Strategy

  • For Gnoll players: Look for Gnoll Brute to unlock the Guardian subclass
  • For other players: Be cautious as Brutes are more challenging than regular Gnolls
  • The Brute may be encountered in groups with other Gnolls

Source Code Reference

  • GnollBrute.java
  • WndPriest.java (where subclass unlock is triggered)

See Also

  • Gnoll
  • Healer NPC
  • Gnoll - Hero class
  • Guardian - Subclass unlocked via this mob
  • Tome of Mastery
  • Gnoll Unlocked - Badge
